tours.title: PALO VERDE
tours.description: Join us to discover this wonderful place full of tradition and nature, located just 1 hour and 30 minutes from Tamarindo. You will be able to enjoy a boat ride on the Tempisque River, the most important in the province, appreciating a great diversity of birds and animals, and then taste authentic Costa Rican food, cooked over wood at Rancho Los Coyotes. To finish, we will make a stop in a mythical village where the locals will show us the process of making ceramic crafts following indigenous tradition.

tours.title: CAÃ‘ON DE LA VIEJA
tours.description: If what you're seeking is adrenaline, this is the best place for you. Located just 2 hours from Tamarindo, CaÃ±on de la Vieja offers you a full day of activities. 10 zip lines and a rock climbing wall will let you enjoy a magnificent view of the canyon. Additionally, you can horseback ride to the river and then conquer the rapids while rafting, not forgetting the buffet service, and ending the day relaxed at the spa, with access to sauna, volcanic mud treatments, and thermal pools that will make this tour an unforgettable experience.

tours.title: LA LEONA WATERFALL
tours.description: Located 2 hours from Tamarindo, this place combines hiking with activity in its fascinating turquoise waters that will take you through caves and waterfalls. Without a doubt, this experience will become a cherished memory of Costa Rica that you will hold dear in your heart.

tours.title: BEACHES TOUR
tours.description: Join us to discover the most beautiful and less visited beaches, in a more personal and unforgettable experience. We will visit beaches with turquoise waters, white sand, and very gentle waves for your enjoyment. Without a doubt, you will reach places that not all tourists have had the chance to explore ðŸ˜‰.

tours.title: LLANOS DEL CORTEZ WATERFALLS
tours.description: Located 2 hours and 30 minutes from Tamarindo, it's the perfect place if you want to swim in its refreshing waters or simply relax on the sand surrounding this wonderful place. Without a doubt, you won't be able to resist taking photos of the impressive main waterfall.

about.title: About us
info: Henry Chaves lives in Villarreal and is a well known member of the community. At the time he started his business he was a solo tour and taxi driver. 20 years later he has driven thousands of miles around the country, has a solid company and goes on enjoying his work.
Now he has a team that shares his same love for the country and a passionate pride to show the best spots in their best season.
Being from Guanacaste, Henry knows well the culture and traditions of the province. His guided tours are a mix of adventure, family trip and dive-in Costa Rican culture.
English speaking, reliable and always on time, Henry and his team treat each drive and passenger as a special one, and make sure that everyone lives the real experience of Costa Rica.
